description: This file defines the Polymer.IronSelection class, which manages selection state for items, including methods for getting, setting, toggling, and clearing selections. It is part of the iron-selector component in the Polymer project.

classes.name: Polymer.IronSelection
classes.description: Class managing selection state for items, supporting multi-selection, toggling, and callbacks.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Returns the selected item(s); array if multi, else single item or undefined.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all selections except those specified in excludes.

methods.name: isSelected
methods.description: Checks if a given item is selected.

methods.name: setItemSelected
methods.description: Sets the selection state for a specific item.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects an item; toggles if multi-selection is enabled.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the selection state of an item.
